articles.title: Researchers successfully grew plants in Apollo-era lunar soil. Their work could inform future space farmers. - Business Insider India

articles.content:
For the first time, scientists have grown plants in soil from the moon. Their insights could one day help future space farmers grow earthly plants on other worlds.
In a new study, published Thursday… [+4329 chars]
